rules_text:
Whenever Mech-Piloted Mech attacks, you may tap another untapped Robot you control. If you do, Mech-Piloted Mech can't be blocked this turn.
{1}, Discard Mech-Piloted Mech: Warpjump. Activate only as a sorcery. [i](You may reveal and cast an Interstellar card you own from outside the game.)[/i]
